content.text:
# Snoop (software)

| latest release version = Solaris 10
| operating system       = Solaris
| genre                  = Packet analyzer
| license                = CDDL
}}
Snoop software is a command line packet analyzer included in the Solaris Operating System created by Sun Microsystems.  Its source code was available via the OpenSolaris project.
See also
*Comparison of packet analyzers
*Network tap
References
External links
*[https://download.oracle.com/docs/cd/E19620-01/805-4003/805-4003.pdf TCP/IP and Data Communications Administration Guide]
*[https://download.oracle.com/docs/cd/E19253-01/816-5166/snoop-1m/index.html docs.sun.com:  man snoop(1M)]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20061208102008/http://src.opensolaris.org/source/xref/onnv/onnv-gate/usr/src/cmd/cmd-inet/usr.sbin/snoop/ OpenSolaris: snoop source code]
